column5: Our MSc in Analytical Sciences MSc is a research-focused degree.You’ll develop the experience and techniques required to be an independent practitioner of modern analytical science, with the skills required for research and by industry.It delivers core teaching in advanced aspects of analytical chemistry and enables you to explore areas of specialist knowledge through optional modules.You’ll apply a wide range of analytical techniques and gain invaluable research experience through an extended research project.Having developed the fundamentals of the analytical sciences, these core techniques are applied to disciplines including:
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year Full Time, 2 years Part Time
